sentence.Network_en: In the Balearics pockets of rural life and inland villages are undisturbed.
sentence.Network_cn: 在巴利阿里群岛上，零星散布在岛内的村庄和那里的生活平静而祥和。

sentence.Network_en: I can spend the whole day undisturbed at the warehouse.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可以一整天都呆在仓库里而不受打扰。

sentence.Network_en: Peonies react badly to being moved and are best left undisturbed.
sentence.Network_cn: 牡丹花不宜挪移，最好别去动它。

entry.tran: 未被动过的；未被移动的；未用过的
entry.def: Something that remains undisturbed is not touched, moved, or used by anyone.

example.tran: 那张桌子看上去没人动过。

example.ex: Peonies react badly to being moved and are best left undisturbed.
example.tran: 牡丹花不宜挪移，最好别去动它。

entry.def: A place that is undisturbed is peaceful and has not been affected by changes that have happened in other places.

example.ex: In the Balearics pockets of rural life and inland villages are undisturbed...
example.tran: 在巴利阿里群岛上，零星散布在岛内的村庄和那里的生活平静而祥和。

example.ex: The war had not left Bargate undisturbed.
example.tran: 巴盖特古城门未能躲过战火的荼毒。

entry.def: If you are undisturbed in something that you are doing, you are able to continue doing it and are not affected by something that is happening.

example.ex: I can spend the whole day undisturbed at the warehouse...
example.tran: 我可以一整天都呆在仓库里而不受打扰。

example.ex: There was a small restaurant on Sullivan Street where we could talk undisturbed...
example.tran: 沙利文大街上有一家小餐馆，我们可以在那里不受打扰地聊。

entry.tran: 不烦恼的；不着急的；不担忧的
entry.def: If someone is undisturbed by something, it does not affect, bother, or upset them.

example.ex: Victoria was strangely undisturbed by this symptom, even though her husband and family were frightened.
example.tran: 尽管丈夫和家人都吓坏了，维多利亚却对这一症状出奇地淡定。

auth_sentence.content: The stream of the unconscious continues to flow undisturbed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The stream of the unconscious continues to flow undisturbed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The stream of the unconscious continues to flow undisturbed.

auth_sentence.content: It is one of Europe's last undisturbed wild areas.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is one of Europe's last undisturbed wild areas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is one of Europe's last undisturbed wild areas.

auth_sentence.content: This helps the parasitic birds to lay their eggs undisturbed.
auth_sentence.res_content: This helps the parasitic birds to lay their eggs undisturbed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This helps the parasitic birds to lay their eggs undisturbed.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"不,无,非,没有"; 2. 表示"打开,解开,弄出"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 新奇的, 不熟悉的, 没有经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+familiar熟悉的→adj.新奇的, 不熟悉的, 没有经验的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不宜的, 不顺利的, 相反的, 令人不快的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+favorable赞成的, 有利的, 赞许的, 良好的→adj.不宜的, 不顺利的, 相反的, 令人不快的
un不,无,非,没有+known知道→adj.不知道的, 未知的 n.不知名的
un不,无,非,没有+official官方的→adj.非官方的
un不,无,非,没有+real真实的→adj.不真实

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未受损伤的,未遭伤害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+scathe损害,伤害+ed……的→adj.未受损伤的,未遭伤害的
un不,无,非,没有+scrupulosu小心的→adj.肆无忌惮的
un不,无,非,没有+toward顺利的→不顺的
un不,无,非,没有+worldly世间的→adj.非尘世的
un不,无,非,没有+abashed难为情的→adj.不害臊的
un不,无,非,没有+act扮演+ed表形容词→adj.未演出的
un不,无,非,没有+alloy合金,混合+ed……的→没混合的
un不,无,非,没有+ambitious有雄心的→adj.无野心的
un不,无,非,没有+assuming自以为是的→adj.不摆架子的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无常的, 不确定的, 不可预测的, 靠不住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+certain肯定的→不确定的

un不,无,非,没有+civilized文明的→adj.未开化的
un不,无,非,没有+comfortable舒服的→adj.不舒服的;不自在的
un不,无,非,没有+conditional有条件的→adj.无条件的
un不,无,非,没有+conscionable凭良心的;明智的→adj.无节制的
un不,无,非,没有+countable可计算的→adj.无数的, 不可数的
un不,无,非,没有+daunt沮丧+ed……的→没被吓倒的
un不,无,非,没有+decided决定的→adj.未决定的

un不,无,非,没有+educated有教养的→adj.未受教育的
un不,无,非,没有+equal平等的→adj.不平等的
un不,无,非,没有+failing有尽头;失败的→没有尽头的

means.word_mean: 未受惊扰的;未被打搅的

sentences.en: The children pursued their studies, undisturbed by the many visitors.
sentences.cn: 孩子们继续学习,不因许多来访者而分心。

means.word_mean: 平静的;镇定的;泰然自若的
